title: Graph the Functions
text: Use a graphing calculator to graph the functions as it is necessary to understand how they compare over the interval [0, 1].

title: Zoom into Graph
text: On the interval [0, 1], g(x) is above f(x). Think abour the relationship between f(x) and g(x).
